item.title: How to setup a static website with Hugo, Github and Cloudflare
item.description: What we’re going to build The idea here is to host a static website, generated locally with Hugo, deployed on Github and served via Cloudlare with SSL termination. Setup a local static site generator Have the sources tracked on github Serve the static site from a domain name - astr3ro.me Add SSL termination with Cloudflare So let’s dive in. Static site generator Initial setup Install and setup Hugo on your local machine Create a new site $ cd ~/ $ hugo new site ast3ro.
